Package ch.icare.smartscan

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CanvasDrawerInterface
    To use your own target view, all you need to do is to implement this CanvasDrawerInterface and give it to the SmartScanner using setCanvasDrawer().
    OnDecoderErrorListener
    Classes implementing this interface will be notified when decoder throws an error
    OnDecoderLoadedListener
    Should be implemented to run code when decoder and camera are ready.
    OnDecoderResultFoundListener
    Should be implemented to receive decoder results
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CanvasDrawer
    This view is overlaid on top of the camera preview.
    DecodedResult
    Decoded result object sent from the decoder thread to the SmartScanner thread.
    SmartScanner
    This class is used to interact with the SmartScan library.
